name: Super Boba - Pachinko Cafe
description:
This is a modern twist on arcade-style pachinko!

This is the perfect AFK game for when you don't want to play an intense game, but would rather just watch or put minimal effort and still win!

Relax and watch numerous objects falling through arrays of moving mechanical pins set on a color shifting background.

Create shockwaves and gravity wells to manipulate the falling objects into target cups. The more you more catch, the more you score!

You can also use it as a semi-interactive "wallpaper" or display; just turn off the UI in the settings!
